评论详情: The size of the dress fit vey well. I’m a size 12 and ordered a large… but the problem is the color. The cuffs on the sleeves and the lg. bow is an obvious yellowish-cream, which looks very bad paired with the WHITE bottom of the dress. I ordered the dress that has the black top, white bottom with black polka dots. Colors are way off do not buy this color style. Pick one without white.
We had Mad Men theme party so I order this dress and I loved it
